name: Mariusz Jan Skobel
profile_summary:
Senior React Native Software Engineer with 10+ years of experience proficiently developing high-performance applications utilizing **React Native**, **JavaScript**, **TypeScript**, and **RESTful APIs**. Demonstrated expertise in integrating **Bluetooth Low Energy (BLE)** technologies and building secure and maintainable solutions that adhere to UI/UX best practices. Strong command of **Git** for version control and leveraging CI/CD practices to streamline deployments. Experienced in creating native modules using **Swift** and **Kotlin** to enhance application capabilities, and knowledgeable in working with **BLE libraries** and **Jest** for comprehensive testing.

Focused on delivering innovative solutions for IoT and smart home ecosystems, particularly in energy systems and EV charging technologies. Exceptional communication skills and a collaborative mindset, with a commitment to driving real-world impact through technology. Proven ability to lead projects from conception to delivery while ensuring compliance with industry standards.
